component.name: Liphium
component.summary: A chat app that's fun again, while also being secure

description.p: This was a minor dev release, getting closer to the Alpha

ul.li: Added a new instance screen that is more clear
Added a talking indicator in the microphone settings
Improved Automatic Voice Detection by using AI
The Windows updater was fixed (why am I putting this on Flathub?)

description.p: Well, Liphium is just a chat app. A self-hosted one. But, you know, we also have end-to-end encryption while not sacrificing security over the features we provide to you. Just like on other apps that aren't encrypted, you can set a status, have nice voice conversations (with actual good quality and advanced settings, so not everyone hears your beautiful voice), play some card games and even share files up to any size using our file sharing offerings. The app is also a little customizable meaning that you can select colors you want as your theme as well as if you want a dark or light theme. In general, if you're looking for a really solid chat app that doesn't sacrifice security, that you can self-host for you and your friends, Liphium might be the right choice.
